title: Winter of Sinking Waters
description: Evy is elated. She gets an entire weekend hanging out with her best friends, both horse and human, with no adults around. All they have to do is take care of the cattle – and eat tons of cake and go for rides and basically do anything they feel like doing. What could be better?Maybe if that big grizzly bear didn’t decide a cow would make a nice dinner...And the cattle didn’t stampede...And the only way to escape from the bear is across the ice covered lake...
author: Angela Dorsey
